Word.Root: To become hard, be grievous, to grow up. To be great or illustrious. To exceed in age, to become stout and tall, or to grow big. A momentous affair.

Meaning.Definition: aor. يَكْبُرُ inf. noun كِبَرٌ He became great or large in body, or in years or age; (he attained to puberty) and in estimation or rank or dignity.
Meaning.Example: كَبُرَ الْاَمْرُ : The affair was or became of great mome
Token(61:4:1:4) It is most hateful in the sight of God (61:4).

Meaning.Definition: To become hard. Very difficult. Severe, grievous, distressing.
Meaning.Example: كَبُرَ عَلَيْهِ الْاَمْرُ : The affair became difficult to him
Token(6:36:3:5) Their aversion is grievous to thee or hard upon thee (6:36).
وَبِدَارًا اَنْ يَّكْبَرُوْا : In haste against their growing up

Meaning.Definition: كَبِرَ (aor. يَكْبَرُ ) : To advance in age; to attain to full growth or adolescence or puberty. كِبَرٌ
Meaning.Example: Token(19:9:10:14) I have reached extreme old age (19:9)
Token(18:6:8:9) كَبُرَتْ كَلِمَةً : Grievous is the word (18:6).
Token(40:57:10:14) There is nothing in their breasts but a feeling of greatness or pride (40:57)
Token(24:12:22:24) Who took upon himself the main part thereof (24:12).

Meaning.Definition: كَبِيْرٌ : Great in body, age, estimation, rank or dignity or nobility.
Meaning.Example: Token(2:218:8:10) Fighting in it is a great sin (2:218).
Token(28:24:25:27) Our father is a very old man (28:24).
Token(12:81:6:7) Their oldest or their leader said (12:81).

Meaning.Definition: كُبَرَاءَ (plural). اَلْكَبِيْرُ A divine attribute or epithet
Meaning.Example: Token(22:63:14:17) اَلْكَبِيْرُ is one of Allah's name (22:63).

Meaning.Definition: An abominable sin or crime or offense.
كُبَّارٌ is intensive form of كَبِيْرٌ
كِبْرِيَاءُ Is synonymous with كِبْرٌ. Nobility, greatness, majesty
اِكْبَرُ is superlative degree meaning more or most great. اَلْكُبْرٰى is feminine of اَكْبَرُ and its plural is كُبَرُ
Meaning.Example: Token(74:36:1:3) It is one of the greatest calamities (74:36).

Meaning.Definition: كَبَّرَ (inf. noun تَكْبِيْرٌ ) : To magnify or be honored
Meaning.Example: Token(17:112:20:21) And extol His Glory with all glorification (17:112).
